entry.summary: ...Windy with Blowing Snow Possible Late this Weekend into Early Next Week... entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 5:54PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong Winds and Blowing Snow Possible This Weekend... A storm system moving across the Bering Sea over the weekend will bring another round of gusty easterly to southeasterly winds to portions of the Yukon Delta and southern Seward Peninsula.
